author: Keith Rozario
content:
Hi Angela,

I'm not defending their actions...merely their right to do this online, it really is no one else business if they decide to willingly post nude photos of themselves online, I'm not sure why you are so angry?

Also, I'd like to point out that the publicity their getting isn't because of people like me, but rather because of judgemental people like you. 

If I were to put myself in their Shoes, I'd predict I want as many people I know to visit my blog. The couple aren't crying victims here, they WANT people to see them....I don't think you quite get the point.
